title: How to Beat the Lunar Event in Terraria

steps.headline: Prepare your loadout.
steps.description: The Lunar Event will show you no mercy, and so you must be ready! These loadout recommendations are flexible, so you can use your own strategies for these. Melee users: Influx Waver, North Pole, Flairon, Vampire Knives, and Chlorophyte Armor w/ Mask. Ranged users: Daedaleus Stormbow w/ Venom Arrows, Snowman Cannon w/ Rocket III, Megashark w/ Venom Bullets, and Shroomite Armor (any kind). Magic users: Razor blade Typhoon, Charged Blaster Cannon, Magnet Sphere, and full Spectre Armor (any kind).

steps.headline: Go to a Dungeon after defeating Golem.
steps.description: There, you will find 4 NPCs near a floating tablet. Kill all of the cultists and fight the Lunatic Cultist! It has quite a variety of attacks, so crowd control weapons are usually recommended.

steps.headline: Go to the Vortex Pillar.
steps.description: If you're lucky, you will spawn right next to it. The Vortex Pillar is a neon blue pillar with a stormy background.

steps.headline: Craft the Phantasm.
steps.description: This will help on the next pillar.

steps.headline: Go to the Stardust Pillar.
steps.description: The Stardust Pillar is a light blue pillar with a starry background. The strategy here is to kill Stardust Cells, let them regenerate, then kill them again. This is where the Phantasm will come in handy.

steps.headline: Craft the Stardust Dragon Staff.
steps.description: It will help on the next pillar.

steps.headline: Go to the Solar Pillar.
steps.description: The solar pillar is a red-orange pillar with a volcanic background. The strategy here is to camp in a closed-off area, and do not get off the ground. This is where the Stardust Dragon Staff will come in handy.

steps.headline: Craft the Daybreak.
steps.description: This will help on the next pillar.

steps.headline: Go to the Nebula Pillar.
steps.description: The Nebula Pillar is a magenta pillar with a cloudy background. There is no strategy here, so just use your kit load out to your advantage.

steps.headline: Defeat the Moon Lord.
steps.description: The way you defeat him is by attacking the eyes on the hands and mouth. Once that is done, attack the core / heart. After that, you will get epic loot, such as the Portal Gun, Meowmere, Moon Bolt, and more!

text: Prepare your loadout. The Lunar Event will show you no mercy, and so you must be ready! These loadout recommendations are flexible, so you can use your own strategies for these. Melee users: Influx Waver, North Pole, Flairon, Vampire Knives, and Chlorophyte Armor w/ Mask. Ranged users: Daedaleus Stormbow w/ Venom Arrows, Snowman Cannon w/ Rocket III, Megashark w/ Venom Bullets, and Shroomite Armor (any kind). Magic users: Razor blade Typhoon, Charged Blaster Cannon, Magnet Sphere, and full Spectre Armor (any kind). Go to a Dungeon after defeating Golem. There, you will find 4 NPCs near a floating tablet. Kill all of the cultists and fight the Lunatic Cultist! It has quite a variety of attacks, so crowd control weapons are usually recommended. Go to the Vortex Pillar. If you're lucky, you will spawn right next to it. The Vortex Pillar is a neon blue pillar with a stormy background. Craft the Phantasm. This will help on the next pillar. Go to the Stardust Pillar. The Stardust Pillar is a light blue pillar with a starry background. The strategy here is to kill Stardust Cells, let them regenerate, then kill them again. This is where the Phantasm will come in handy. Craft the Stardust Dragon Staff. It will help on the next pillar. Go to the Solar Pillar. The solar pillar is a red-orange pillar with a volcanic background. The strategy here is to camp in a closed-off area, and do not get off the ground. This is where the Stardust Dragon Staff will come in handy. Craft the Daybreak. This will help on the next pillar. Go to the Nebula Pillar. The Nebula Pillar is a magenta pillar with a cloudy background. There is no strategy here, so just use your kit load out to your advantage. Defeat the Moon Lord. The way you defeat him is by attacking the eyes on the hands and mouth. Once that is done, attack the core / heart. After that, you will get epic loot, such as the Portal Gun, Meowmere, Moon Bolt, and more!
